actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for expenses allocable to the use of any portion of a dwelling unit in providing certain day care services whether or not such a portion is exclusively used for such purpose.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt trade or business expenses incurred in providing day care services on a regular basis in a taxpayer's dwelling unit from the prohibition on deducting expenses with respect to a dwelling unit which is used by the taxpayer as his residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for expenses allocable to the use of any portion of a dwelling unit in providing certain day care services whether or not such a portion is exclusively used for such purpose.
